definition: this or that very day/in the next few days
namely/that is/i.e./prompt/at once/at present/even if/prompted (by the occasion)/to approach/to come into contact/to assume (office)/to draw near
abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan

sentences.english: From now onwards will focus on sprucing up village land violations.
sentences.chinese: 從即日起保定市將集中清理各種土地違法行爲。

sentences.english: It would be much pleasanter all around for you to remit today.
sentences.chinese: 如能即日付款，雙方都會很愉快。

sentences.english: On this day we honor you: dear mother.
sentences.chinese: 我們將戮力使即日成爲您過得最愉快的母親節。

sentences.english: Today is my last working day in BYC.
sentences.chinese: 即日乃餘事於揚巴之最後一日也。

sentences.english: Today began to forget all the troubles, happy to spend every day.
sentences.chinese: 即日開始忘記所有煩惱，開開心心度過每一天。

sentences.english: This Pass is non-transferable and non-refundable.
sentences.chinese: 即日通用車票不得轉讓及退款。

sentences.english: The collection book is $90 and ready for reservation.

sentences.english: Today; I heard my sister masturbasebasl bating in her room.
sentences.chinese: 即日，我聽見了我的姐姐在她的房間內中ZW。

sentences.english: I inform you that I have this day retired from the business carried on by Mr. Gotohmyself in partnership.
sentences.chinese: 茲告知從即日起，我退出後藤公司的合夥人地位。

sentences.english: C. P. Trading new edition website.
sentences.chinese: 從即日起本公司開始使用新版網站。

sentences.english: I forgot to prepend up being the speech Iim supposed to give today.
sentences.chinese: 我忘了綢繆即日的我該做的演講了。

sentences.english: Manage Day trade and Over-night commission calculation.
sentences.chinese: 可計算即日或過夜佣金。

sentences.english: As from today, NEEA starts to accept online registration.
sentences.chinese: 自即日起，考試中心開始接受新托福考試網上報名。

sentences.english: Iid like to pick sea shells this day.
sentences.chinese: 即日下午我想去撿貝殼。

sentences.english: There wa lot as news in the morning paper today.
sentences.chinese: 即日的晨報上有許多音信。

definition: within the next few days/in a few days time
the day after tomorrow/from hence/from now/from now on/henceforth
(to do sth) with dispatch/as soon as possible
ordained or appointed to a post/to benefit from counsel
